highstreet.name: High Street
highstreet.description: The main street of town filled with all sorts of wares and shops for the hearty traveller.

near.text: Duck into an alley to avoid the crowd.
You hear people cheering and singing in jolly tones. You step in through the bar to scope out the finest mead.
You look into the well and see the reflection of a tired and weary traveller in the water. Unfortunately the water here is no magic elixir.
You notice behind you is the pearly gates that you entered through!

tavern.name: Tavern
tavern.description: A nice warm tavern for the best meads

near.text: The main street of town is filled with all sorts of wares and shops for the hearty traveller. You check it out!
You have been sinning at a higher rate than ever lately. Maybe you should step into the church to atone for your sins.
You feel a coin in your pocket, and spot a well nearby to wish for better days.
The sombre atmosphere of the church creeps you out, you decide to return to High Street.
You feel darkness start to consume you. You decide to explore the graveyard outside.
The church wine leaves a horrible taste in your time, time for a beer!

graveyard.name: Graveyard
graveyard.description: Spooky graveyard! Do not stay here at night

near.text: This graveyard is too spooky! You need to find god.
The dead aren't such good company, you decide to return to the lively High Street.
You see a gate through the graveyard that leads you down a path to a well.

well.name: Well
well.description: Legend has it a small child fell into the Well but the body was never found...

near.text: You are creeped out by the dark abyss of nothingness in the well and turn to find solace in the graveyard.
The highstreet calls your name loudly with the promise of life and laughter.
You have a horrible taste in your mouth, time for a beer!
You spy the town gates in the corner of your eye...

gate.name: Gate
gate.description: Pearly gates with the pleasant views of the countryside call yonder...

near.text: Strike forth on the road out of town and into the Country!
You are frightened by the thought of leaving the bustling town, so you head back to the well...
Adjacent to the gate is the call of Highstreet beckoning!

sidestreet.name: Alley
sidestreet.description: A dark, cramped alley, turns out there's nothing here.

near.text: Go back.
